io.github.bananapuncher714.ocelot.api

Interface OcelotTracker


  • public interface OcelotTracker
    Interface for an entity tracker. Ability to set the VisibilityController.
    Author:
    BananaPuncher714

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int getChunkRange()
      Not sure what this is, most likely a rough tracking distance.
      org.bukkit.entity.Entity getEntity()
      Get the entity associated with this tracker.
      java.util.Set<org.bukkit.entity.Player> getPlayers()
      Get a set of all players who can see the entity associated with this tracker.
      int getTrackingDistance()
      The distance for how far away the entity is visible.
      VisibilityController getVisiblityController()
      Get the current VisibilityController associated with this tracker.
      boolean isDeltaTracking()
      Not sure what this is for.
      void setVisibilityController(VisibilityController controller)
      Set the current VisibilityController for this tracker.
      void track(org.bukkit.entity.Player player)
      Same thing as calling update( Player ).
      void trackPlayers(java.util.List<org.bukkit.entity.Player> players)
      Same thing as calling track( Player ) on all the players in the list.
      void untrack(org.bukkit.entity.Player player)
      Remove visibility of the entity associated with this tracker for the player provided.
      void update()
      Same thing as calling update( Player ) on every player who can see the entity associated with this tracker.
      void update(org.bukkit.entity.Player player)
      Update the visibility of the player provided.

    • Method Detail

      • getEntity

        org.bukkit.entity.Entity getEntity()
        Get the entity associated with this tracker.
        Returns:
        The Bukkit entity, may be a player.

      • getTrackingDistance

        int getTrackingDistance()
        The distance for how far away the entity is visible.
        Returns:
        Returns the NMS value, may be vanilla or from the spigot config.

      • getChunkRange

        int getChunkRange()
        Not sure what this is, most likely a rough tracking distance.
        Returns:
        Amount in chunks.

      • isDeltaTracking

        boolean isDeltaTracking()
        Not sure what this is for.
        Returns:
        The NMS boolean for "delta tracking".

      • getPlayers

        java.util.Set<org.bukkit.entity.Player> getPlayers()
        Get a set of all players who can see the entity associated with this tracker.
        Returns:
        A new set containing all players. Modifications to this set do not affect the real collection.

      • track

        void track(org.bukkit.entity.Player player)
        Same thing as calling update( Player ).
        Parameters:
        player - The player to update visibility for.

      • trackPlayers

        void trackPlayers(java.util.List<org.bukkit.entity.Player> players)
        Same thing as calling track( Player ) on all the players in the list.
        Parameters:
        players - The list of players who need to update visiblity for.

      • update

        void update(org.bukkit.entity.Player player)
        Update the visibility of the player provided.
        Parameters:
        player - Will either grant or remove visibility of the entity based on the VisibilityController.

      • update

        void update()
        Same thing as calling update( Player ) on every player who can see the entity associated with this tracker.

      • untrack

        void untrack(org.bukkit.entity.Player player)
        Remove visibility of the entity associated with this tracker for the player provided.
        Parameters:
        player - The player to remove visibility of.

      • setVisibilityController

        void setVisibilityController(VisibilityController controller)
        Set the current VisibilityController for this tracker.
        Parameters:
        controller - Can be null to remove current VisibilityController.

      • getVisiblityController

        VisibilityController getVisiblityController()
        Get the current VisibilityController associated with this tracker.
        Returns:
        The current VisibilityController, may be null.
